author: Author
loginSubtitle: Sign in to your account to access all features
aboutText: For detailed information about 'Gutenberg publishing house' and books published by the publishing house.
aboutParagraph1: Gutenberg is a modern audio library that gives you access to a catalog of bestsellers and classic literature, including news from various genres: from fiction to non-fiction and business books. Over 368,000 audio books in more than twenty different genres.
aboutParagraph2: The library's usual idea is that instead of buying individual books, you can access the entire catalog. We don't sell books and force you to download them, but we give them to you for reading without restrictions and on various devices. A subscription is enough.
aboutParagraph3: In the usual sense, e-books have so far been similar to paper books: these are separate files that need to be downloaded and stored somewhere, then thrown to the reader-reader, and if you have several reading devices, you will have to store a separate copy in each of your libraries. If you not only read books, but also save bookmarks and notes, you often have to manually synchronize all this.
aboutParagraph4: For avid readers and with pleasure, we decided to turn MyBook into a library club, by joining which you can read not only the books you have, but also publications from our extensive catalog.
aboutMetaDescription: Gutenberg is Uzbekistan's largest audio library. Thousands of audiobooks, hundreds of authors, and millions of listeners. A journey into the world of audio literature.
aboutMetaKeywords: about Gutenberg, Uzbek audio library, audiobooks platform, Gutenberg history, audio literature
heroMotto: Ad astra per aspera — From darkness to light

booksSectionDescription: In this section, you can get complete information about the works published by our publishing house.

aboutPublisherHeading: What kind of publishing house is Gutenberg?
aboutPublisherDescription: Five centuries ago, Johannes Gutenberg's invention led to the popularization of books and the beginning of the Renaissance. We have set ourselves a similarly ambitious goal.
ourGoalText: We aim to contribute to a new intellectual renaissance by delivering the most advanced ideas of our time in the Uzbek language.

contactFormDescription: If you want to contact us about a specific issue, we ask you to contact us via the email address or phone number opened for that specific issue. Otherwise, your inquiry may be left unread.
